sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"保护，保卫"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: defend, protect, safeguard, guard, shield, shelter, harbour
means: defend ： 普通用词，指用武力或其它措施使人或物不受损害，消除危险。用作比喻时，指坚持某种行动、决定或意见。
protect ： 普通用词，指用某种手段作为防御工具以防危险或伤害。
safeguard ： 语气强，指采取积极措施预防可能发生的一切攻击或危险。
guard ： 普通用词，指保持警惕以防可能的攻击或伤害。
shield ： 语气比protect强，但侧重防止迫在眉睫的攻击或伤害。
shelter ： 通常指寻找安全地方躲避风雨或使人免遭危害。
harbour ： 贬义词，指隐匿或非法保护、窝藏。

sentence.Network_en: Those people who took up weapons to defend themselves are political prisoners.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些拿起武器自卫的人是些政治犯。

sentence.Network_en: Torrence expects to defend her title successfully in the next Olympics.
sentence.Network_cn: 托伦斯希望在下届奥运会上能够卫冕成功。

sentence.Network_en: Every man who could fight was now committed to defend the ridge.
sentence.Network_cn: 每个能够参加战斗的男子现在都决心要保卫这条山脊。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French defendre, from Latin defendere, from de- 'off' + -fendere 'to strike'. Compareoffend

encyclopedia.content: 英语单词defend defend英音：[di'fend]美音：[dɪ'fɛnd] 及物动词 vt. 1.防御；保卫；保护 We shall defend our city, whatever the cost may be. 不管代价如何，我们要捍卫我们的城市。 2.【体】防守锛埱蛎诺蕊級 3.【律】为。..辩护；作。..的辩护律师 She defended herself successfully in court. 她在法庭上成功地为自己作了辩护。 4.为。..辩护；为锛埪畚牡蕊級答辩 不及物动词 vi. 1.防御；保卫；保护 2.

entry.def: If you defend someone or something, you take action in order to protect them.

example.ex: Every man who could fight was now committed to defend the ridge...
example.tran: 每个能够参加战斗的男子现在都决心要保卫这条山脊。

example.ex: His courage in defending religious and civil rights inspired many outside the church...
example.tran: 他在捍卫宗教和公民权利时所表现出来的勇气鼓舞了许多教会之外的人。

entry.def: If you defend someone or something when they have been criticized, you argue in support of them.

example.ex: Matt defended all of Clarence's decisions, right or wrong...
example.tran: 克拉伦斯的决定，不管对错，马特都予以维护。

example.ex: The author defends herself against charges of racism by noting that blacks are only one of her targets...
example.tran: 面对种族主义指控，作者替自己辩护说黑人只是她的抨击目标之一。

entry.def: When a lawyer defends a person who has been accused of something, the lawyer argues on their behalf in a court of law that the charges are not true.

example.ex: ...a lawyer who defended political prisoners during the military regime...
example.tran: 在军人政权时期为政治犯辩护的律师

example.ex: He has hired a lawyer to defend him against the allegations...
example.tran: 他已聘请了一位律师针对这些指控为自己辩护。

entry.def: When a sports player plays in the tournament which they won the previous time it was held, you can say that they are defending their title.

example.ex: Torrence expects to defend her title successfully in the next Olympics...
example.tran: 托伦斯希望在下届奥运会上能够卫冕成功。

example.ex: India had to struggle to beat defending champions South Korea 2-0.
example.tran: 印度队苦战之下才以 2 比 0 击败卫冕冠军韩国队。

means.word_mean: 1. argue or speak in defense of;
2. be on the defensive; act against an attack
3. protect against a challenge or attack;

sentences.sentence: "Hold the bridge against the enemy's attacks"
"The senator said he would oppose the bill"

means.word_mean: 5. protect or fight for as a champion
6. be the defense counsel for someone in a trial;

stems_affixes.value_cn: 防守,保卫;为……辩护,为……答辩
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去,离+fend打击→把[敌人]打跑→保卫,防护

stems_affixes.value_cn: 努力;力争;供养;照料;保护
犯罪,冒犯,违反,得罪,使……不愉快
stems_affixes.word_buile: of一再+fend打击→一再打击别人→得罪

Sentence.sentence: However, Soren Andreasen, a social scientist at Dalberg Global Development Partners who supervised the writing of the report, defended it, saying that it was clear that the numbers were rough estimates.
Google defends its scanning in-copyright books by saying that the online display of in-copyright books is not for commercial use.

sentences.en: They defended very well in the game.
sentences.cn: 在那场比赛中他们防守得很好。

sentences.en: She defended herself successfully in court.
sentences.cn: 她在法庭上成功地为自己进行了辩护。

jushi.english: Who is defending in this case?
He is better at defending than attacking.
jushi.chinese: 他的防御能力比进攻能力强。

jushi.english: During the Warring States period, more walls were put up to defend the borders of the different kingdoms.
jushi.chinese: 战国时期,各国修建了许多城墙来保卫边境。
